name: makio
description: Leading foot on the soul plate (one footed grind).

name: soul
description: Leading foot on the soul plate. Your other foot should be in front, in the groove, pointing towards the grinding surface.

name: torque soul
description: Leading foot on the soul plate. Your other foot should be in front, in the groove, pointing towards the grinding surface and angled inwards.

name: acid
description: Leading foot on the soul plate. Your other foot should be in front, in the groove, pointing away from the grinding surface.

name: mizou
description: Leading foot on the soul plate. Your other foot should be behind, in the groove, pointing away from the grinding surface.

name: sunnyday
description: Leading foot on the soul plate. Your other foot should be crossed behind, in the groove, pointing towards the grinding surface.

name: mistrial
description: Leading foot on the soul plate. Your other foot should be behind, in the groove, pointing away from the grinding surface and angled inwards.

name: x-grind
description: Leading foot on the soul plate. Your other foot should be in front, also on the soul plate in a topside position.

name: stub soul
description: Leading foot on the soul plate. Your other foot should be in front, on the negative soul plate.

name: sidewalk
description: Leading foot on the soul plate. Your other foot should be crossed behind. Same as a sunnyday but you get much lower, to the point where your back foot is grinding the boot instead of the groove.
